MS MCQs

    Configure bins on the location card in Dynamics 365 Business Central

    »

    1. On the Bin Policies FastTab of the location card, you can enable the Always Create Pick Line feature. What is the result of selecting this option?

      When you release a sales order for that location, the program automatically creates a warehouse pick document.

      When you create a warehouse shipment for that location, the program automatically creates a warehouse pick document.

      When you run the Create Pick function on a warehouse shipment, the program creates pick lines in the pick worksheet for all items on the warehouse shipment.

      The program will create a pick line, even if it can’t find items to pick, and it will create blank zone and bin fields, leaving it up to the user to locate and insert values manually.


    2. What is the Bin Capacity Policy used for in Business Central?

      Specifies how the program uses the capacity information on bins and items.

      Determines if Business Central will allow receipt of items with assigned bin numbers.

      Sets the maximum number of bins that are allowed in Business Central.

      Sets the capacity policy for bins for each zone.
